Name: Beauty from Wisdom
About the game: This is a Sudoku + beauty CG game. A Sudoku question is randomly generated in each level. You can unlock a beautiful CG after passing the level. The difficulty of the level keeps increasing. I wish you unlock all the levels and successfully challenge your limit!
